title: Change to window scaling
body: I would suggest to add a full screen button. For example I use  double monitors both of them 1600 x 900. Not much I know but the window feels really small to me.

replies.body: We are working on allowing you to increase the size of the client, it is coming.

The new PBE update added the window size option, thanks.
However, I can't select 1080p as an option. It kind of negates the whole point of changing the window size if I can't put the client in fullscreen.
Yeah it bothered me in legacy client too.
